byline.contributor: Joseph Goldstein and Julfikar Ali Manik contributed reporting.
byline.original: By RICK ROJAS, LIZ ROBBINS, NOAH REMNICK and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM

abstract: New York City police charge Oscar Morel with murder in connection with shooting deaths of Muslim imam Alauddin Akonjee and his assistant Thara Miah in Ozone Park, Queens;  after taking him into custody for hit-and-run,  investigators say they found what they believe to be murder weapon in Morel's home as well as clothes matching description of what gunman was wearing during shootings.
lead_paragraph: The man, Oscar Morel, 35, was taken into custody late Sunday after the police connected him to a hit and run that occurred about a mile away from the fatal attack, the police said.
snippet: The man, Oscar Morel, 35, was taken into custody late Sunday after the police connected him to a hit and run that occurred about a mile away from the fatal attack, the police said....

headline.main: Brooklyn Man Charged With Killing Imam and Assistant Near Mosque
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Man Charged With Killing Imam and Assistant Near Mosque
